messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Genetics Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Captain's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a swarm of mice have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.
